title: mogen Anthony shares her most outrageous and over-the-top Halloween looks over the years
text:
Imogen Anthony is the queen of outrageous and over-the-top Halloween costumes.

And although she and her radio star boyfriend, Kyle Sandilands, won't be hosting their annual Halloween party this year, the model, 28, has showed off her greatest looks over the years.

Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, the blonde shared a slew of snaps of her wildest transformations.

'You can't say I'm not committed!' Imogen Anthony has taken to Instagram to share her most outrageous and over-the-top Halloween looks over the years (Pictured: Imogen as Christina Aguilera in 2018)

She explained in the caption: 'A small collection of some of my other Halloween costumes from over the years (inc. just a random costume of me as Harley Quinn that I just wanted in this slide lol).'

'I mean, you can’t say I’m not committed,' she added.

Just days ago, Imogen dressed up like her pet dog - a hairless Chinese Crested named Feng.

Puppy love: Just days ago, Imogen dressed up like her pet dog - a hairless Chinese Crested named Feng

Going all out! Last year, she impressed partygoers at her annual Halloween party dressed as the alien, Diva Plavalaguna, from the science fiction film, The Fifth Element

And last year, she impressed partygoers at her annual Halloween party dressed as the alien, Diva Plavalaguna, from the science fiction film, The Fifth Element.

She painted her face and body blue and donned a a bizarre headpiece with tentacles.

That same year she showed off her other Halloween costume option, inspired by the album cover of band Crazy Town 2000 hit Butterfly.

Come, come, my lady: That same year she showed off her other Halloween costume option, inspired by the album cover of band Crazy Town 2000 hit Butterfly

Imogen's outfit included a leather tube top, a plaid mini skirt, devil horns and a halo, a choker necklace and an array of tattoos.

That same year she also dressed up as Christina Aguilera from her raunchy music video Dirrty, wearing a tiny bikini and leather chaps for a Halloween party in Los Angeles.

In 2017, she channeled Shania Twain's feisty leopard print look from her 1997 music video, That Don't Impress Me Much.

She rounded out her ensemble with auburn brown hair and accessorised with a round animal print suitcase - just like the country-pop queen.

That DOES impress me much: In 2017, she channeled Shania Twain's feisty leopard print look from her 1997 music video, That Don't Impress Me Much

Nailed it! She rounded out her ensemble with auburn brown hair and accessorised with a round animal print suitcase - just like the country-pop queen

Move over Margot! Imogen also shared her Harley Quinn outfit from a 2016 photoshoot, complete with a Daddy's Lil Monster shirt, mini shorts, fishnet stockings and a baseball bat

Imogen also shared her Harley Quinn outfit from a 2016 photoshoot, complete with a Daddy's Lil Monster shirt, mini shorts, fishnet stockings and a baseball bat.

And in 2014, she dressed as Angelina Jolie's Maleficent in a large velvet cloak with a staff and horns, as well as prosthetic cheekbones.

Kyle and Imogen announced they will not be hosting their annual Halloween Party this year.

The shock jock's management told Daily Mail Australia that the event is unlikely to take place as both Kyle and Imogen will be in Los Angeles at end of the month.
description: Imogen Anthony is the queen of outrageous and over-the-top Halloween costumes.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
